titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يَحِلُّ لَحْمُ الْبَهِيمَةِ الَّتِي تُنْكَحُ
titles.en: Chapter 10 – It is not Permissible, the flesh of the animals which have been copulated with (by a man)

titles.ar: باب فِي لَحْمِ الْفَحْلِ عِنْدَ اغْتِلَامِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 11 – Regarding the flesh of the stallion during its heat

titles.ar: باب مَا يُنْتَفَعُ بِهِ مِنَ الْمَيْتَةِ وَ مَا لَا يُنْتَفَعُ بِهِ مِنْهَا
titles.en: Chapter 9 – What can be benefited with from the dead, and what cannot be benefitted with from it

titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يَحِلُّ لَحْمُ الْبَهِيمَةِ الَّتِي تُنْكَحُ
titles.en: Chapter 10 – It is not Permissible, the flesh of the animals which have been copulated with (by a man)

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (22/55)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ شَمُّونٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ عَنْ مِسْمَعٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ

text: أَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ ( عليه السلام ) سُئِلَ عَنِ الْبَهِيمَةِ الَّتِي تُنْكَحُ فَقَالَ حَرَامٌ لَحْمُهَا وَ كَذَلِكَ لَبَنُهَا .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Sahl Bin ZIyad, from Muhammad Bin Al Hassan Bin Shamoun, from Abdullah Bin Abdul Rahman, from Misma’a,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> that Amir Al-Momineen<sup>asws</sup> was asked about the animal which had been copulated with (by a man). So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Its flesh is Prohibited, and similar to that is its milk’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people have narrated from Sahl ibn Ziyad from Muhammad ibn al-Hassan ibn Shammun from ‘Abd Allah ibn ‘Abd al- Rahman from Misma‘ who has said the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said that ’Amir al-Mu’minin, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, was asked about an animal sexually molested. ’Amir al-Mu’minin, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, said, ‘Its flesh is unlawful for food as well as its milk.’”
